title: Apple Fitness+ is now available in Japan
description: Apple expanded its Fitness+ service to 28 markets last month, including Chile, Hong Kong, India, the Netherlands, Singapore, and Taiwan, and said that Fitness+ would launch in Japan in early 2026. Well, it's not really early 2026, but the service is now available in the East Asian island country. The Apple Fitness+ subscription costs JPY980/month or JPY7,800/year in Japan. However, new Fitness+ users in Japan will get a free one-month trial, while those purchasing a new Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, AirPods Pro 3, or Powerbeats Pro 2 are eligible for a 3-month trial. Members...

title: Redmi Turbo 5 Max charging details revealed as pre-orders go live
description: New official details about the Redmi Turbo 5 Max have surfaced ahead of its China launch later this month. The company has also recently confirmed the smartphone’s chipset and battery capacity. The Redmi Turbo 5 Max will support 100W PPS wired charging along with 27W reverse wired charging. It will also feature bypass charging, while its 9,000mAh battery is claimed to retain performance for up to 1,600 charge cycles. Additionally, Redmi will back the Turbo 5 Max with a five-year battery warranty. In an internal battery endurance test comparing it against other smartphones, the Turbo...

title: Evleaks says Galaxy S26 Ultra will get more than four color options
description: Just a day after a leak suggested four color options for the upcoming Galaxy S26 Ultra, a new tip now claims the flagship will launch in as many as six finishes. In a post on X, well-known tipster Evan Blass shared the full list of color variants for the Galaxy S26 Ultra. Galaxy S26 Ultra renders (by @EclecticDaily) According to the leak, the phone will be available in black, white, silver shadow, sky blue, cobalt violet, and pink gold. This contradicts yesterday’s report, which claimed the Galaxy S26 Ultra would be offered in Black Shadow, White Shadow, Glacial Blue, and...

title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra spotted in real-life images with a 300mm telephoto extender
description: Oppo’s camera-focused flagship, the Find X9 Ultra, is rumored to launch in March. Although the company has yet to make anything official, several leaks have already surfaced. The latest leak shows the alleged device in real-life images with a teleconverter kit. A tipster on Weibo has shared images of the alleged Oppo Find X9 Ultra, showing the device fitted with a teleconverter kit that includes a dedicated case, camera grip, and the external telephoto extender. The images also reveal a large 300mm telephoto converter lens attachment. Also visible are multiple physical buttons on...

title: Realme 16 runs Geekbench confirming its chipset and RAM amount
description: The Realme 16 should join the Realme 16 Pro and Realme 16 Pro+ in the brand's portfolio soon, as it was already seen in some retailer listings last week. Now, the phone has seemingly been spotted in the Geekbench online database with the model number RMX5171. The device is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6400 SoC, and the prototype which ran the benchmark had 8GB of RAM, though, of course, other amounts might be offered upon launch as well. The Realme 16 will unsurprisingly run Android 16 from day one. According to the aforementioned retailer listings, the Realme 16 comes with a...

title: Xiaomi 18 is getting a camera upgrade
description: According to the prolific Chinese leaker who goes by Digital Chat Station on Weibo, the upcoming Xiaomi 18 will come with a periscope telephoto camera. In fact, it's very likely to be the same 50MP f/3.0 camera with 5x optical zoom that the Xiaomi 17 Pro uses. The Xiaomi 18 will also get an ultrasonic fingerprint scanner, wireless charging support, as well as very high dust and water resistance. It's expected to use the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 SoC, though it's still unclear which one - rumor has it there will be the 8 Elite Gen 6 but also an 8 Elite Gen 6 Pro. Xiaomi may opt for the...

title: vivo led India's smartphone market in 2025 with double-digit shipment growth
description: According to Omdia, vivo led India's smartphone market in 2025, grabbing 21% of the pie with 32.1 million shipments. It was followed by Samsung with 15% and 23 million shipments, Oppo and Xiaomi with 13% each (20 million and 19.7 million shipments, respectively), and Apple with 10% from 15.1 million units shipped. Compared to 2024, vivo grew 19% in 2025, Oppo grew 10%, Apple grew a whopping 28%, while Samsung fell 11% and Xiaomi shipments declined by 26%. Overall smartphone sales in India in 2025 were 1% lower than in 2024 at 154.2 million units. In the fourth quarter of 2025, vivo...

title: Spotify's Page Match will let you sync your progress between audiobooks and physical books
description: Spotify is in the news today and not because of yet another price hike, believe it or not. Instead, a new report has uncovered a feature that's coming soon to Spotify's audiobooks. It's called Page Match and it's pretty clever - it lets you take a photo of a page in a physical book, and once you do that Spotify will take you to the exact same spot in the audiobook. This lets you easily jump from the audio version to a physical text, if you're so inclined. What's more, it's bidirectional - so it also lets you know what page in the physical book the place you're at in the audiobook...

title: Sony and TCL announce joint venture, Bravia TVs part of deal
description: Seemingly out of nowhere, TCL announced it plans to acquire Sony’s home entertainment branch, including TVs and home audio equipment. The two companies are set to enter a joint venture, with TCL controlling a commanding 51% share. As per the press release, the TCL-led venture will “leverage Sony's high-quality picture and audio technology, brand value and operational expertise” combined with “TCL's advanced display technology, global scale advantages, industrial footprint, end-to-end cost efficiency”. Furthermore, the products will still carry Sony and Bravia branding. The new...

title: One UI 8.5 Beta 4 changelog leaks, here's what's coming
description: Samsung’s One UI 8.5 Beta 4 update for the Galaxy S25 series is expected to roll out this week. Ahead of its release, a tipster has revealed key details about the update, including the full changelog. The tipster shared the changelog and firmware version for the One UI 8.5 Beta 4 for the Galaxy S25. It will reportedly carry the firmware version ZZAB. As per the leaked changelog, the Beta 4 will include an updated Bixby, which showed up on a Reddit thread earlier this month. The update will address several bugs, including an issue with search history in the Phone app and problems...

title: Motorola G67 and G77 extensively leaked by retailer
description: A pair of unreleased Motorola phones were spotted on a Greek retailer’s website. Not to be confused with the Moto G67 Power, the vanilla Moto G67 is a Dimensity 6300-equipped budget entry featuring a 6.8" AMOLED with FHD+ resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. The listing confirms a 32MP selfie camera up front, alongside a 50MP rear shooter (LYTIA 600) and an 8MP ultrawide lens. Moto G67 The device is IP64 rated and equipped with 4GB RAM and 128GB storage. It brings a hybrid dual SIM slot that accommodates a single nanoSIM card and a microSD card for storage expansion. The phone...

title: Oppo Reno15 FS launches with SD 6 Gen 1 and 6,500mAh battery
description: The latest addition to Oppo's Reno15 series is here with the Reno15 FS, which touched down across several EU markets. The device is nearly identical to the Reno15 F, however, the FS model comes with a slightly smaller 6,500mAh battery and a single 8GB RAM and 512GB storage trim. Oppo Reno15 FS Reno15 FS brings the CPH280 model number and features a 6.57-inch AMOLED display with FHD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate. The panel features a 50MP selfie camera as well as an optical fingerprint scanner. The back gets a 50MP main shooter, an 8MP ultrawide and a 2MP macro...

title: The iQOO 15 Ultra posts record-breaking AnTuTu score of 4.5 million
description: The iQOO 15 Ultra is the upcoming mega-gaming phone from vivo's sub-brand, and it looks quite capable, performance-wise. Today, iQOO Product Director Galant V shared the iQOO 15 Ultra's record-breaking AnTuTu score on Weibo. The upcoming flagship posted 4,518,403 points, which breaks down like this - 1,322,001 in CPU, 1,594,848 in GPU, 593,523 in memory, and 1,008,031 in UX. The memory score is the only one that doesn't top the chart. The iQOO 15 Ultra is expected to be a beefed-up variant of the iQOO 15. It will have "the biggest active cooling fan ever", and will arrive in early...

title: A free, ad-supported tier is set to launch on Xbox Cloud Gaming later this year
description: There have been rumors about Microsoft working on a free, ad-supported tier for its Xbox Cloud Gaming service, and now we have solid proof coming straight from Microsoft. Some users report that they've spotted a new message saying "1 hour of ad-supported playtime per session," although there's no such tier just yet. It's a clear sign that the company is preparing a free tier, confirming earlier rumors. According to people familiar with the matter, Microsoft is planning to launch the ad-supported tier by the end of this year, and it won't be the first company to do it. Nvidia's...

title: vivo X200T's key specs, launch date, and design revealed
description: vivo's X200 series currently includes five smartphones, and today, vivo announced it will add a new member to this lineup next week - the X200T. The vivo X200T will be unveiled in India on January 27 at 12 PM local time. vivo is advertising the X200T as a smartphone "engineered for travel and real-world photography," and it will come in two colors - Seaside Lilac and Stellar Black. The vivo X200T will be powered by the Dimensity 9400+ SoC, run OriginOS 6 out of the box, and pack a 6.67" 120Hz screen with 5,000 nits of peak brightness. vivo says the display is co-developed with...

title: Honor Watch GS 5 debuts with up to 23 days of battery life
description: Honor unveiled the Magic8 Pro Air and the Magic8 RSR Porsche Edition in China yesterday. Alongside the new smartphones, the company also introduced the Watch GS 5, which succeeds the Watch GS 3. The Honor Watch GS 5 gets a 1.32-inch circular AMOLED display with 1,500 nits of brightness. It gets a 44mm case made from an aluminum alloy, whereas the back uses a reinforced polymer fiber. The smartwatch weighs just 26g, measures 9.9mm in thickness, has a single side button, and carries an IP68 rating along with 5ATM water resistance. It can be paired with black or khaki leather...

title: OnePlus 13s gets bypass charging, 50MP photo edits in India
description: OnePlus India is seeding a firmware update to the OnePlus 13s with some nice upgrades. The firmware, OxygenOS 16.0.3.501, is currently rolling out, and features bypass charging, and 50MP photo editing as highlights. The bypass charging kicks in when doing more intensive tasks like gaming, streaming, or navigating, and allows both using the phone and charging the battery. Editing up to 50MP photos without loss of quality is available in the OnePlus Photos app. Here's the full changelog. OP 13s – Changelog OP 13s IN:...

title: RedMagic 11 Air arrives with Snapdragon 8 Elite and 7,000mAh battery
description: As expected, RedMagic 11 Air made its debut in China earlier today as a bridge between the thin and light phone trend and gaming phones. It arrives with the signature transparent design, an active cooling fan with RGB lighting and last year’s Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. Like previous entries in the RedMagic lineup, the 11 Air gets an unobstructed AMOLED display with a 16MP under-display selfie camera and an optical fingerprint scanner. The panel measures 6.85 inches in diagonal and features 1,216 x 2,688 px resolution, a 144Hz refresh rate and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i...

title: iQOO 15R teased, design revealed
description: iQOO announced the iQOO 15 for international markets last November, with India being the first to receive the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5-powered flagship. Today, iQOO India's CEO Nipun Marya announced on X that the iQOO 15R is "coming soon." Marya's X post also includes a teaser image that reveals the iQOO 15R's design. The smartphone's specs haven't been revealed yet, but an email we received from iQOO said the 15R will offer "Power-packed performance with a perfect fit." Judging by the design, the iQOO 15R could be a version of the iQOO Z11 Turbo, which launched in China last...

title: Motorola Edge 70 Fusion complete specs leaked
description: The Motorola Edge 60 Fusion, which debuted in April last year, is due for an upgrade. Right on schedule, the Edge 70 Fusion has now surfaced in a new leak that reveals its full set of specifications. According to prominent tipster Evan Blass, the Motorola Edge 70 Fusion carries the internal codename “Avenger.” The smartphone is said to be powered by the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC, marking a shift from the Dimensity 7400 chipset used in its predecessor. The phone will feature a quad-curved 6.78-inch OLED display with 144Hz refresh rate, 5,200 nits peak brightness, HDR10+, and Gorilla...
